sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>meat</radical> radical and <kanji>meat</kanji> are the same in looks as well as in meaning.
meaningInfo: Study those radicals, and perhaps we'll eat some meat tonight.
readingMnemonic: You know there's people-eating going on here, with this kanji. So, when you think of this <kanji>meat</kanji>, you'll have to think about whose meat it is. In this case, it's <reading>Nick</reading>'s (<ja>にく</ja>) meat.
readingInfo: Do you know someone named <reading>Nick</reading> you can imagine? There's celebrities too, if you don't have someone. Someone like <reading>Nick</reading> Cage would do the trick.
